column1: harold ""mack"" mc. daniel| harold ""mack"" mc. danielborn: april 08
column7: 2015. mr. mc. daniel was a native of natchez
column8: mississippi and a longtime resident of jacksonville. he was a u. s. navy veteran of world war ii and had retired after 50 years with the iron workers local union 597. mack was preceded in death by his wife
column9: susie evelyn mc. daniel in 2004. survivors include his daughter
column12: lisa walters and darin nieman (christina); six great grandchildren
column17: christopher nieman and lauren nieman; three great-great grandchildren
column19: ava rovello and bella mayi; as well as other loving family and friends. funeral services will be held at 11:00 am wednesday
column21: in the chapel of corey-kerlin funeral home
column23: with rev. steve mc. collum officiating. interment will follow in evergreen cemetery. the family will receive friends from 6:00 to 8:00 pm tuesday (today) at the funeral home. send sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
